hackathon-description-text: The aim is to discover insights and develop new solutions for electric vehicle charging.
hackathon-eligibility: Must be at least 18 years as per Indian Voter Card ID.
hackathon-requirements: Must need to submit all the collaterals consisting of PPT, PDF, ZIP, CODE, Github repo links etc.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Category wise prizes for the teams.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Ansal Villas, Sat Bari, New Delhi, Delhi 110074, India

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Do you think your idea is feasible?
Do you think your idea has huge market potential?
